name: Metaburst
description: MetaBurst is a P2E arcadeame which is inspired by a legendary game called Flappy Bird. At MetaBurst, players will immerse themselves in the role of a spaceship captain by crafting spaceship, forging the parts, explore planets, and challenging the others. At MetaBurst, we believe that having an unique spaceship NFT is one of the ways the game can be appealing and engaging, but also rewarding to the players.
